_meta.note: This file contains English text as placeholders. Professional translation required.

signIn.title: Welcome back
signIn.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
signIn.accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
signIn.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.

signUp.title: Create your account
signUp.subtitle: Get started with nChat today
signUp.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
signUp.termsAgreement: By signing up, you agree to our {{termsLink}} and {{privacyLink}}
signUp.acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions
signUp.checkInbox: Please check your inbox and verify your email

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link
forgotPassword.checkEmail: Please check your email for reset instructions
forgotPassword.userNotFound: No account found with this email
forgotPassword.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

emailVerification.title: Verify your email
emailVerification.subtitle: We sent a verification link to {{email}}
emailVerification.checkInbox: Please check your inbox and click the verification link

twoFactor.title: Two-factor authentication
twoFactor.subtitle: Enter the code from your authenticator app
twoFactor.setupSubtitle: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
twoFactor.codesWarning: Save these codes in a safe place. Each can only be used once.
twoFactor.confirmDisable: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA?

magicLink.title: Sign in with magic link
magicLink.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a magic link
magicLink.checkEmail: Check your email and click the link to sign in
magicLink.linkUsed: This magic link has already been used

sso.title: Single Sign-On
sso.subtitle: Sign in with your organization
sso.notConfigured: SSO is not configured for this workspace

session.inactive: You've been signed out due to inactivity

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.invalidInput: Please check your input and try again
errors.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please try again later.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
